signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the limitations of user licenses when setting up their trial account.
signals.customer_ask: Clarification on whether they can add more users without exceeding their license limit.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the process of integrating chat functionality into their website.
signals.customer_ask: How to implement chat on their website.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is facing difficulties with collaboration features, specifically regarding external users accessing shared inboxes.
signals.customer_ask: How to invite external users to collaborate on emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a way to automate follow-up emails for pending requests.
signals.customer_ask: Can they set up automated reminders for emails that haven't received a response?

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the lack of differentiation in handling emails for different terminals.
signals.customer_ask: How to manage emails specific to different terminals effectively.
